name: iEM: Mini Jam - 10 - Entry
description:
If the game doesn't work, go to https://pq-3.weebly.com/

You are a block called Blokie who ventures about pixlle land with an ever shinking idea of what is going on. 

Don't get too small or you won't be able to pass the levels.

Use arrow keys to move,

Use space to Glitch Jump

Press R to restart the game

Reach the Golden Gates at the end of each level to advance

(the game isn't over as soon as you think)
